bio:
Nerien appears to warn the Dragonborn that their actions in Saarthal will trigger a chain of events that cannot be stopped, and that judgement will be passed on their actions to come and how they deal with the dangers ahead of them.
Nerien reveals himself to the Dragonborn upon leaving the Mzulft Aedrome, shortly after the Oculory is calibrated. On this occasion, Nerien urges them to return to the College of Winterhold, before vanishing.
name: Nerien
